QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Aspartic acid
QAPair.Answer: Aspartic acid helps every cell in the body work. It plays a role in: Hormone production and release, Normal nervous system function, Plant sources of aspartic acid include: Avocado, Asparagus, Molasses, Animal sources of aspartic acid include: Wild game, Oysters, Sausage meat,
